thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: New York mid town
thread.title_full: New York mid town - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: OccasionalJoe
title: New York mid town
text:
We have stayed at this hotel three times while visiting family in New York. Its location is fairly central in New York City so it's good for visiting attractions; sites, museums, shopping and restaurants. It's just off 3rd Ave.
The hotel itself is in a recently renovated building and everything feels new. The rooms are on the small side but not by New York standards.
The staff is friendly and helpful.
Price fluctuates by season and day of the week, but we found it to be better than most hotels we investigated.
Room Tip: Rooms are clean and neat; small but not unusually small for New York.. See more room tips Green Features: Housekeeper did leave hanging towels so they could be reused. Waste basket included section for recycling
